titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 612.
Mr. Hoyer moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 211 - 178, 12 Present (Roll no. 822).

bill.summary:
8/3/2007--Introduced.
Declares that, by certain actions on August 3, 2007, a specified Member has brought dishonor and discredit to the U.S. House of Representatives by misusing the powers of the chair.
